      • updateColumnToMD5Hash

        public static java.lang.String updateColumnToMD5Hash(java.lang.String yourTable,
                                                     java.lang.String nameColumnToCodify,
                                                     java.lang.String nameColumnToUpdate,
                                                     boolean ifNull)
        UPDATE yourTable SET nameColumnCodified = MD5(nameColumnToCodify) WHERE nameColumnCodified IS NULL;
        Parameters:
        yourTable - string name of the table.
        nameColumnToCodify - string name of the column to codify.
        nameColumnToUpdate - string name of the column to insert.
        ifNull - if true set the new Value only where the old value is NULL.
        Returns:
        string query.

      • updateCopyAColumnWithPrefix

        public static java.lang.String updateCopyAColumnWithPrefix(java.lang.String yourTable,
                                                           java.lang.String nameColumnToCopy,
                                                           java.lang.String nameColumnToInsert,
                                                           java.lang.String prefix)
        SELECT nameColumnToCopy FROM yourTable; UPDATE yourTable SET nameColumnToInsert = nameColumnToCopy; UPDATE yourTable SET nameColumnToInsert = CONCAT('prefix',nameColumnToInsert);
        Parameters:
        yourTable - string name of the table.
        nameColumnToCopy - string name of the column to copy.
        nameColumnToInsert - string name of the column to insert.
        prefix - string prefix on the new copied column.
        Returns:
        string query.

      • prepareDeleteQuery

        public java.lang.String prepareDeleteQuery(java.lang.String myDeleteTable,

                                           java.lang.Object[] values,
                                           java.lang.String[] columns_where,
                                           java.lang.Object[] values_where,
                                           java.lang.String condition)
        Method to create a query string for the delete operation. http://stackoverflow.com/questions/3311903/remove-duplicate-rows-in-mysql
        Parameters:
        myDeleteTable - String name of the table where execute the edelete operation.
        columns - string Array of columns name of the record.
        values - string Array of value of the record.
        columns_where - string Array of columns name for where condition of the record.
        values_where - string Array of value for where condition of the record.
        condition - string condition AND,OR.
        Returns:
        the string for delete a query.
